description: Lancashire sign Australian batter Katie Mack for the first part of the women's domestic season.
title: Australian batter Katie Mack joins Lancashire for early part of season
title_page: Australian batter Katie Mack joins Lancashire for early part of season - BBC Sport
maintext:
Lancashire have signed Australian batter Katie Mack for the first part of the women's domestic season.
Mack will be available for eight One-Day Cup games and three in the T20 Blast running until the beginning of June.
The 31-year-old, a regular in the Women's Big Bash for Adelaide Strikers, is returning to Emirates Old Trafford, having played for the Thunder in last year's competition, scoring 324 runs in nine matches in the 50-over competition.
